excelaccess.xmldescriptor.xml_creator module¶

@author: uidq3472

class excelaccess.xmldescriptor.xml_creator.XMLParser(cfg_xml_path)[source]¶

Reads/Writes XML files in Context of Excel file tasks.

Parameters:cfg_xml_path (str) – a (relative) path to a XML configuration file
add_excel_config()[source]¶

Adds a configuration element to the Excel file tag. Returns a Excel config element in each and every case.

Returns:Excel config element
Return type:xml.etree.ElementTree.SubElement
add_header(table_elem)[source]¶

Adds header element if not existing. Returns a header element in each and every case.

Parameters:table_elem (xml.etree.ElementTree.SubElement) – table element where to add header element
Returns:header element
Return type:xml.etree.ElementTree.SubElement
add_header_field(parent_elem, title)[source]¶

Adds a header field element to its parent. Which is either a header element or an other header field element. Returns a header field element in each and every case.

Parameters:
  • parent_elem (xml.etree.ElementTree.SubElement) – parent element where to add header field element
  • title (str) – the title of the header field
Returns:

header element
Return type:

xml.etree.ElementTree.SubElement
add_sheet(sheet_name)[source]¶

Adds a sheet element if not existing. Returns a sheet element in each and every case.

Returns:sheet element
Return type:xml.etree.ElementTree.SubElement
add_table(sheet_elem, table_id, table_start=’‘, table_end=’‘, header_rows=’‘)[source]¶

Adds a table element if not existing. Returns a table element in each and every case.

Parameters:
  • sheet_elem (xml.etree.ElementTree.SubElement) – sheet element where to add table element
  • table_id (int) – id of the table
  • table_start (str) – start cell of table in Excel notation
  • table_end (str) – end cell of table in Excel notation
  • header_rows (int) – row count of table header
Returns:

table element
Return type:

xml.etree.ElementTree.SubElement

Reads xml tree from existing source file.

remove(elem_tag, elem_parent, elem_attrs=None, elem_values=None)[source]¶

Looks for an element by its values and removes it from its parent. Returns True if element was found and removed and False if element could not be found.

Parameters:
  • elem_tag (str) – tag to be searched
  • elem_parent (Element) – parent element from which to start to search
  • elem_attrs (list(str) or None) – xml attribute keys
  • elem_values (list or None) – values for each attr key
strip(elem)[source]¶

Removes leading and trailing spaces from elements and their texts.

Parameters:elem (Element) – XML element which text is to be stripped
write_xml(out_path)[source]¶

Writes xml tree to .xml-file

Parameters:out_path (str) – path (including filename) where output should be saved
